record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - July 17, 2007)

[Page: S9530]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the following interns in my office be allowed floor privileges during today's session of the Senate: Erin McGuire, Maureen McGuire, Owen Thal, Samantha Currier, and Sonia Russo.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Jack Kammerer, a fellow in my office, be granted the privilege of the floor during the remainder of the debate on the Defense authorization bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Dodd, I ask unanimous consent that his fellow, Taniesha Woods, be granted the privilege of the floor during the consideration of the higher education reconciliation bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Ann Clough, a detailee in my office, be granted the privileges of the floor for the remainder of the debate on H.R. 2669.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
